name: keepassxc
description: KeePassXC is a cross platform password manager that stores credentials in encrypted local databases. It supports browser integration, auto typing, hardware keys and syncing via self chosen storage, giving users full control over their secrets.

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: AES-256 encryption for password database with master password protection. Military-grade security for credentials

features.title: Password Generator
features.description: Create strong, random passwords with customizable rules and patterns. Never use weak passwords again

features.title: Hardware Key Support
features.description: YubiKey and other FIDO2 devices for additional authentication layer. Maximum security for sensitive data

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Store database in cloud storage for access across devices. Your choice of sync provider

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Groups, tags, and custom icons for organizing password entries. Keep credentials organized
